00348     bool _checkSize( int s )
00349     {
00350         for ( int i = 0; i < 16; i++ )
00351         {
00352             printf( "Checking...%d\n", ( 1 << i ) + 1 );
00353 
00354             if ( s == ( 1 << i ) + 1 )
00355                 return true;
00356         }
00357 
00358         return false;
00359 
00360     }
